data.name: Die With Glory – The Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack from Die With Glory game. Composed by Alexander Berdin-Lazursky.

Track list:
1. Main Theme
2. Main Battle Theme
3. Valkyries Are Chicks
4. Giant Nose
5. Air Battle Intro
6. Air Battle Shrimps
7. Air Battle Theme II
8. Air Battle
9. Shroom City
10. Oriental
11. Lava Man
12. Lava Woman
13. Giggly Battleship
14. Fun Massacre
15. Drunk Bard
16. Underground Dancе
17. Air Flow
18. Fly Fight
19. Live In Tavern
20. Fly Fight Chapter II
21. Long Adventure
22. Tavern Theme
23. Viking Bolero
24. Viking Samba
25. Vikingodin

fullgame.name: Die With Glory — Point and Click Adventure Game

data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win XP+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.6+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
